mapper.update: update t_role_resource set f_role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, f_resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, f_resource_type = #{resourceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_resource_name = #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_raw_update_time = #{rawUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_raw_add_time = #{rawAddTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_resource_type_name = #{resourceTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, f_role_id, f_resource_id, f_resource_type, f_resource_name, f_raw_update_time, f_raw_add_time, f_role_name, f_resource_type_name from t_role_resource where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
